PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04572025-03-23FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Development Investment Corporation -- Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to enter into a contract with the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation (CEEFC) in order to finance the new facility, which he is of the opinion is necessary to maintain the efficiency of the financial system in Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Finance to enter into a contract with the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation (CEEFC) in order to finance the new facility, which he is of the opinion is necessary to maintain the efficiency of the financial system in Canada.
